title: Sun Goddess Karma Login Screen - [Unofficial]

embed.description: Art by: Riot Games Music by: Austin Wintory

body: Couldn't believe there wasn't already an animation for this one, so had to put one together myself! Let me know what you think!

replies.body: This is STUNNING. I love the choice of the Journey soundtrack. God that introduction where the threads of light began to move gave me chills. Amazing work!
Thank you so so much! That really means a lot! Had so much fun with this one, so I'm really glad you liked it! <3

> [{quoted}](name=The Vampire Boy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TQWnscmM,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2019-01-09T21:43:13.201+0000)
>
> Thank you so so much! That really means a lot! Had so much fun with this one, so I'm really glad you liked it! <3

It's seriously outstanding! I can't get over the subtleties in the motions of her face. I'm obsessed with this.
Hire him :P
I know its an old skin but hot damn you guys gotta put this in the game.
prepare to be **immortal **with this post {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Amazing. Reminds me of Civilization.

Thanks so much! <3 

I 100% considered using Baba Yetu from Civ 4 as the background track, but couldn't find an instrumental version :( But I totally feel you!
Baba Yetu is a banger.

> [{quoted}](name=The Vampire Boy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TQWnscmM,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2019-01-10T00:41:02.751+0000)
>
> Thanks so much! <3 
> 
> I 100% considered using Baba Yetu from Civ 4 as the background track, but couldn't find an instrumental version :( But I totally feel you!

This inspired me to try a custom login myself. Can you point me towards what software you used and how to get started.

Most of it is Adobe After Effects and Photoshop! Riot actually released a really cool series on the basics of how they put the login screens together, so there's a great place to start!

https://vimeo.com/user73213403 <--- here's the link!

> [{quoted}](name=The Vampire Boy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TQWnscmM,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T07:46:36.312+0000)
>
> Most of it is Adobe After Effects and Photoshop! Riot actually released a really cool series on the basics of how they put the login screens together, so there's a great place to start!
> 
> https://vimeo.com/user73213403 <--- here's the link!

Thank you! I really appreciate this!
Siiiiiiiiiiiick
Extremely well done! Would love to know more about the process to create this! How many hours did this take?
Ahh thank you so much! I'll have to make a breakdown sometime! There's a good amount of 3d modeling in this one which took a minute, so probably around 100 hours in total?
They should actually fucking hire you, holy shit.
Absolutely gorgeous.
Ahh thanks so much! <3

Why u arent hired yet?

This is professional.
Can someone tell me what part of the Journey soundtrack this particular part is from?
Bruh I **wish** Riot put that much effort into anything Karma related. That’s amazing. I’m saving that song btw.
Ahh thank you! And the whole Journey soundtrack is honestly just as incredible as this track, especially the last two on the album!

Good job. You are really talented.

The skin in game looks like sh*t though lol. :D Great job though <3

As a fan of this skin, and Karma in general, I just want to say that this is absolutely stunning! The focus on the thread's path from the rising sun to Karma's delicate fingers was pure magical and spell-binding, and the sound effect it makes while it glitters and sparkles its way to the end added to that feeling. The soundtrack overall brought to life the breath-taking scenery of the environment and setting of the art. Finally, those subtle movements you gave Karma complimented her otherworldly beauty and graceful demeanor that this art intended. Thanks for sharing your creativity and talent with us :)
Ahh thank you so so much! This really means a lot! It's easily one of my favorite skins, and I had so much fun putting this together. So glad you liked it! <3
Noice, how u made dis?

Riot recently made a short video series about how they put their login screens together actually! It's a great place to start if you're interested in this kind of thing!

Link here! ---> https://vimeo.com/user73213403
Wow, really really good.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Absolutely stunning. Well Done!
If the reds are commending you...accept the job. :P
AMAZING
please do this hero next ! :D{{champion:266}}  with the Prestige Skin
LOVE that new art, would totally make for a good animation!
obligatory upvote for rocking the morellonomicon
You should post this on Reddit. They'll go nuts over it (if the mods allow it to be posted).
Wow, so talented 10/10. Beautiful Karma.
Holy shit. That is AMAZING. Even when compared to Riot's own.
Thank you!! <3 I appreciate it!

So beautiful!!! I'd also see something done just as superb with the geisha karma skin. Keep up the good work! 

~JeonGoyangi {{sticker:sona-playing}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Thank you!! No idea what's coming next but Sakura Karma's also got amazing art, I agree!
I would say that this is better than a lot of the login screens Riot has done.  Totally amazing.
this is so beautiful

Holy *crap*. This is awesome!

Do you have/are planning to get a degree in graphic design or something, because this would be fantastic for your portfolio if so!
Riot artist tier. Offer this man a job!
115 upvotes and no downvotes. That's how you know you're doing something right.
That is amazing. Very well done.
I like it.
